mapper.update: update sys_rule_strategy_combine_rel set strategy_id = #{strategyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, combine_order = #{combineOrder,jdbcType=CHAR}, combine_rule_id = #{combineRuleId,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select id, strategy_id, combine_order, combine_rule_id, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_rule_strategy_combine_rel where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select id, strategy_id, combine_order, combine_rule_id, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_rule_strategy_combine_rel

select id, strategy_id, combine_order, combine_rule_id, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_rule_strategy_combine_rel where 1 = 1
and strategy_id like CONCAT('%',#{strategyId},'%')
and combine_order like CONCAT('%',#{combineOrder},'%')
and combine_rule_id like CONCAT('%',#{combineRuleId},'%')
and rec_stat like CONCAT('%',#{recStat},'%')
